pages.text: Using the holidays for some testing! Happy Holidays to all of you! def foobar(): 1 2 3 4 print ( 'Hello World' ) ::: bash To follow the path
pages.title: Holiday Testing

pages.text: Christmas is coming! It's already December. To bring you into christmas mood I'm sharing links to some of my favorite christmas songs: " Have Yourself a Merry Little Christmas" by Frank Sinatra: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nZ6yQgBvuoI " White Christmas" Bing Crosby & Martha Mears: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SvfhoWIPoVw " Sleigh Ride" John Konesky: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3dwxMh4gXcM
pages.title: Christmas Songs

pages.text: Today I'm sharing a link to another photography blog I read on a regular basis: http://blog.joemcnally.com
pages.title: Today's webtip - blog.joemcnally.com

pages.text: This is my first post in the Photography category. Today I'm sharing a link to a photography blog I read on a regular basis: http://www.bythom.com/ I can highly recommend it!
pages.title: Today's webtip - bythom.com

pages.text: Recently I started to use soup.io. You can access my microblog at http://parobalth.soup.io/
pages.title: Soup.io

pages.text: I finally found a solution to my vim issues with the system clipboard. I just had to install vim-gtk to make "*p and "+p work (Debian Wheezy). Stackoverflow post: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/11489428/how-to-make-vim-paste-from-and-copy-to-systems-clipboard
pages.title: Vim - system clipboard

pages.text: This is the first post. I managed to set up a pelican powered blog with github user pages. There is still a lot of testing and learning necessary! Useful links and tutorials: http://mathamy.com/migrating-to-github-pages-using-pelican.html http://nafiulis.me/making-a-static-blog-with-pelican.html https://pages.github.com/ http://www.vcheng.org/2014/02/22/migrating-from-wordpress-to-pelican/ Best place to view pelican themes: http://pelicanthemes.com
pages.title: First Post

pages.text: Hello World from Pelican! I'm testing Pelican.
pages.title: Hello_World
